name: Pool Clash: new 8 ball game
description:
Pool Clash is an absolutely new and ultimate addictive 8 ball pool game! Play the most realistic and enjoyable free pool simulator around with stunning graphics, fantastic playability and super accurate ball physics on your mobile now.

A fresh new way to play billiards: Contest Mode!
In this mode, players have health and damage. Pocket balls to deal damage to your opponent. Whoever gets their opponent's health to zero first, wins! Bonuses are generated in the pockets. Collect them with balls and earn fun bonuses and boosters.

Challenge yourself!
Compete for the best scores! Play matches, refine your skills and enter TOP-ranked tournaments to win trophies and exclusive cues! The fun never ends with the free eight pool game: earn more points to make your way into a higher division and get exclusive chests full of special Pool Clash cards and bonuses!

Challenge your friends!
Put your skill to the ultimate test by defying other players from around the world online and enjoy the thrill of challenging the very best pool players. No more dead heat: play mini games to climb up the char in this enjoyable pool games available on mobile.


Open new locations!
Experience billiards like never before with a variety of stylish levels. Open many fascinating locations and play pool in New York, Tokyo, Nepal and many many more to come. Level up your ranking and get access to more exclusive locations, where you play against the best Pool players.

Play for Pool Clash trophies!
Play mathes, win special cards and upgrade your equipment to the maximum. Perform more advanced shots with total pool table customization, precise cue stick’s parameters, accuracy control over the cue ball and and ability to adjust your spin.Complete daily tasks and unique achievements to advance faster.

Game Features:
- single player mode;
- online multiplayer mode;
- variety of sophisticated levels;
- 3D stunning graphics;
- super realistic and accurate ball physics.

The thrilling excitement of pool game and the best billiards experience! Join Pool Clash now!
